item.title: Learn Aider: AI Coder
item.description: Overview This blog will document my journey of reading the source code of Aider. I will explore the basic structure of the repository and highlight key learnings. Aider has an official blog and documentation that includes insights from the author. Main In the main function, Aider functions as a CLI tool. It creates a coder object and initiates coder.run(). If a Git repository doesnâ€™t already exist, it will set one up for you.
